title: Calendar (simple)
description: Calendar is a multi function calendar that can render any period of time and data. It is based on GridSwiper. It can also be used to create a standard calendar.

properties.name: container
properties.desc: selector where to create this object

methods.name: val
methods.desc: set or get the selected date

methods.name: display
methods.desc: set or get the displayed date

events.name: OGX.Calendar.SELECT
events.desc: when the end user selects a date/time

events.name: OGX.Calendar.UNSELECT
events.desc: when the end user unselects a date/time
